1.name: Smithing Recipe→Item
1.prompt:
Create an item definition for this smithing recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "smithing_iron_axe",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "smithing",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "iron_ingot",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Iron Ingot",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Moderately conductive, somewhat malleable when heated. The workhorse of civilization - reliable, abundant, essential for weapons, tools, and armor.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "metal",
        "standard"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "birch_plank",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Birch Plank",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Refined birch planks, perfect for detailed craftwork.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "wood",
        "fine"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Solid iron axe for serious forestry work. Bites deep and true."
}

Return ONLY the JSON item definition, no extra text.

2.name: Refining Recipe→Material
2.prompt:
Create a material definition for this refining recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "refining_steel_ore_to_ingot",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "refining",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "steel_ore",
      "quantity": 1,
      "materialName": "Steel Ore",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Harder and more durable than pure iron. The secret of its strength lies in its carbon-rich structure. A true warrior's metal.",
      "materialTags": [
        "basic",
        "metal",
        "advanced"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Forging steel from carbon-rich ore. Requires intense heat."
}

Return ONLY the JSON material definition, no extra text.

5.name: Enchanting Recipe→Enchantment
5.prompt:
Create an enchantment definition for this enchanting recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "enchanting_protection_advanced",
  "enchantmentId": "protection_2",
  "stationTier": 2,
  "stationType": "enchanting",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "guardian_essence",
      "quantity": 5,
      "materialName": "guardian_essence",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "",
      "materialTags": []
    },
    {
      "materialId": "steel_ingot",
      "quantity": 4,
      "materialName": "Steel Ingot",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Superior to iron in every way. Holds a keen edge, resists corrosion, and strikes with authority.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "metal",
        "advanced"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "sapphire",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "sapphire",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "",
      "materialTags": []
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Advanced protective enchantment using guardian essence. Creates a magical barrier that deflects harm."
}

Return ONLY the JSON enchantment definition, no extra text.
